class vehicle.Truck(x, y, road, length)¶

class vehicle.Vehicle(x: int, y: int, road: Road, length: int = 1)¶

Bases: object

calculate_accel(leader: vehicle.Vehicle) → float¶
Parameters

leader – Vehicle that is ahead

Returns

new_accel: Calculated acceleration

Calculates the acceleration of the vehicle using the Intelligent Driver Model (IDM).

Called by Vehicle.update_speed.

change_lane(dest_lane)¶
Parameters

dest_lane – Lane that the driver wants to reach

Returns

Nothing

Author

TEST

NOT YET IMPLEMENTED - Changes the lane of the vehicle to the dest_lane.

get_gap(leader)¶
Parameters

leader – Other vehicle

Returns

gap - The value of the gap between the vehicle 1 and the vehicle 2

Calculates the gap between two vehicles assuming the given vehicle is ahead and return the absolute value of it.

update_speed(leader: vehicle.Vehicle, dt: float) → None¶
Parameters

  • leader – Vehicle that is ahead.

  • dt – Time increment used in simulation

Returns

Nothing

Updates the speed of the vehicle using the ballistic method.

Traffic simulator
